Text: Alans Made Some Big ChangesFriends and Colleagues I am truly pleased and excited to report that on November I will start my new job as Director Government Affairs for Enron Corporation in its Portland Oregon Office I will be supporting Enron North Americas Western power trading desk which is located there Among other people I will be working with Tim Belden and Paul Kaufman I will be commuting between there and my home in California until I can move the family up sometime during Q My new contact information is as follows G Alan Comnes Director Government Affairs Enron Corporation World Trade Center SW Salmon WTC Portland OR mobilepager phone for the time being for the time being Please keep in touch and if you are in Portland give me a holler Cheers Alan Comnes
